\begin{equation}
ds^2=\left(\frac{r + L}{r - L}\right) dr^{2}+4 L^{2}\left(\frac{r -
L}{r + L}\right) (d\psi+\cos \theta
d\phi)^{2}+(r^{2}-L^{2})(d\theta^{2}+\sin^{2}\theta
d\phi^{2})\label{TN}.
\

\begin{equation}
V=\int_{0}^{8\pi M} dt \int_{2M}^{r}s^2\, ds \int_{0}^{\pi }\sin\theta
\,d\theta \int_{0}^{2\pi}d\phi=\frac{32}{3}\pi^2 M
r^3\,\left(1-\left(\frac{2M}{r}\right)^3 \right)
\
